Command.name: JavaScript
Command.label: 蓝色注释
Command.tooltip: 蓝色注释（本页最后修改）

Item.name: ScriptCode
Item.value: // default style var strokeColor = color.blue; var opacity = 0.8; this.syncAnnotScan(); var annots = this.getAnnots(this.pageNum, ANSB_ModDate, true, ANFB_ShouldAppearInPanel); if (annots != null) { for (var i = annots.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) { if (annots[i].type == "Highlight") { opacity = annots[i].opacity; strokeColor = annots[i].strokeColor; break; } } }
